code: import React from'react';import{MapContainer,TileLayer,Marker,Popup}from'react-leaflet';import{LatLng}from'leaflet';import'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css';import markersData from'../data/artifacts.json';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MapPage(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Artifacts Map"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:'400px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MapContainer,{center:new LatLng(20,0),zoom:2,style:{height:'100%',width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TileLayer,{url:"https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",attribution:"\xA9 OpenStreetMap contributors"}),markersData.map(artifact=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marker,{position:new LatLng(artifact.coordinates[0],artifact.coordinates[1]),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Popup,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:artifact.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:artifact.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Era: ",artifact.era]})]})},artifact.id))]})})]});}export default MapPage;
